name: pomodoro
description: Pomodoro website is a Productivity tool that can be used to focus on completing tasks/study/code with ambient music of your choice.  The website consists of a customizable pomodoro timer along with short break and long break, different themes, ambient background sounds and a tasks section to record the tasks to be completed. The pomodoro technique has been proved to improve efficiency and keep oneself focussed, which is the purpose of this project.
